text: visvasigalu, visvasigalannu bittu dhikkarigalannu tam'ma posaka ragisikollabaradu. Hage madidatanige allahanondige yava nantu uliyadu â€“ nivu avarinda suraksitaragiralu kevala bhadrateya kramavagi hage madiddare adu ksamya. Allahanu tanna kuritu nim'mannu eccarisuttane. Konege nivu allahanedege maralabekagide
